definition: first round or stage (of a match, election, talks, planned policy etc)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: A full moon hung in the sky on Mid-autumn Day.
sentences.chinese: 中秋那天，一輪圓月掛在天空。

sentences.english: The launch of the iPad in 2010 triggered a new round of innovation in the startup community.
sentences.chinese: 2010年iPad的問市推動了新一輪的創新浪潮。

sentences.english: The fear is that the next election, due next year, will follow the same course.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕明年的下一輪選舉也難逃相同的厄運。

sentences.english: In a matrix, or "round robin" competition, a round allows all contestants in a pool to fight once.
sentences.chinese: 在循環賽中，每一輪允許所有選手均比賽一次。

sentences.english: The Moon whispers in your heart like an old soul everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 那一輪清月，卻似神祕的心靈低語，如影隨形。

sentences.english: We are anxious that the same mistake is not repeated in the current round of negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 我們殷切希望在新一輪談判中不要重犯同樣的錯誤。

sentences.english: The target paladin loses his Divine Grace bonuses for one round.
sentences.chinese: 目標聖武士將在這一輪內失去他的神恩獎勵。

sentences.english: The latest round of storms also battered Zhengzhou, capital of Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 最新一輪的暴風雨還襲擊了河南省會鄭州。

sentences.english: The sky a bright moon, video card two Bingxin.
sentences.chinese: 天上一輪明月，映證兩顆冰心。

sentences.english: Love, is the youth frenzy years round of apricot yellow months, fine but hazy.
sentences.chinese: 愛情，是青春迷亂歲月裏的一輪杏黃月，美好而朦朧。

sentences.english: According to party rules, they could have fought a further round.
sentences.chinese: 儘管根據黨章他們可以進行更深一輪的競爭。

sentences.english: Explanation: On February 2nd, a first quarter Moon shone in planet Earth's early evening sky.
sentences.chinese: 2月2日，一輪上弦月閃爍在地球夜晚的天空中。

sentences.english: The sun goes down and a cold moon comes creeping up the sky.
sentences.chinese: 太陽落山了，天空升起了一輪冷月。

sentences.english: This is their first institutional round.
sentences.chinese: 這是他們的第一輪籌資。

sentences.english: But the latest boom has proved a curse as well as a blessing.
sentences.chinese: 然而，最新一輪的經濟繁榮將會是福禍並存。

sentences.english: The Duha Round is a new round of WTO multi-trade negotiation rounds.
sentences.chinese: 多哈回合是WTO的新一輪多邊貿易談判回合。
